Contact Us
==========

**City Hall**  
(830) 876-2476  
FAX: (830) 876-3127

The Carrizo Springs City Hall building is located on U.S. Highway 277, 308 West Pena Street, Carrizo Springs, TX. 78834.

Phone: 830-876-2476  
Email: [mguerra@cityofcarrizo.org](mailto:mguerra@cityofcarrizo.org)

Hours:  
M-F 8:00am - 5:00pm
